Posts.Content: Thanks for your reply, I think I'm worried about the outcome of making an appointment and what the doctor might say and if it is something serious I wouldn't know how to tell my parents/friends. Thank you for your advice and encouragement! Xx

Posts.Title: Worried

Posts.Content: Hi all, I'm 17 and a few months ago I found a lump in my breast. I thought I'd just ignore it and it'd go away but it hasn't. It doesn't seem to have grown at all in size and isnt that painful, I know that breast cancer is quite rare in girls my age but I'm still worried and dont know how to tell anyone/even a doctor. Any advice from someone who's felt the same would be hugely appreciated Thanks
